name: Scrap Rooms
description:
SCRAP ROOMS is a twin stick shooter where you got to reach the last level and stop the factory's robot production.

-Everything is randomly generated, from dungeon's structure to enemies/turrets/traps locations

-When playing. you can change the dungeon's structure to get different results (in Options Settings, go to Reset Level)

-Made in Unreal Engine 4

-Controls:

WASD: Move

Left Mouse Button: Shoot

Spacebar: Use shield

Enter Key: Pause/Options
